description: This Kotlin source file defines navigation routes and a navigation host for an Android app using Jetpack Compose. It specifies routes such as home, details with an ID parameter, search, and settings, and provides a composable function to set up the navigation graph with corresponding UI scaffolds.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: Object holding route constants and a helper method to generate detail routes with specific IDs.

methods.name: detailsFor
methods.description: Constructs a details route string with a specific item ID.

methods.name: AppNavHost
methods.description: Sets up the NavHost with composable destinations for Home, Details, Search, and Settings screens.

methods.name: ScreenScaffold
methods.description: Displays a large, tv-friendly scaffold with a title and subtitle.
